Columns.Description: The logical server name of the SQL DW.
Columns.Name: LogicalServerName

Columns.Description: The azure resourceGroup of the SQL DW.
Columns.Name: ResourceGroup

Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The operation associated with log record.
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: The request Id of the SQL requests.
Columns.Name: RequestId

Columns.Description: The PdwNodeId of the SQL requests.
Columns.Name: PdwNodeId

Columns.Description: The distribution id of the SQL requests.
Columns.Name: DistributionId

Columns.Description: The Status of the SQL requests.
Columns.Name: Status

Columns.Description: The error id of the SQL requests.
Columns.Name: ErrorId

Columns.Description: The startTime (UTC) of the SQL requests.
Columns.Name: StartTime

Columns.Description: The end time (UTC) for the SQL requests.
Columns.Name: EndTime

Columns.Description: The row count of the SQL requests.
Columns.Name: RowCount

Columns.Description: The sp id of the SQL requests.
Columns.Name: SpId

Columns.Description: The command of the SQL requests.
Columns.Name: Command

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
